mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_LOG ( GAME_LOG_NO, SCORE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MEM_NO, LEVEL_NO, COMBO, CLEAR_TIME ) VALUES( SEQ_GAME_LOG.NEXTVAL, #{score}, #{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memNo}, #{levelNo}, #{combo}, #{clearTime} )
mapper.select: WITH DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS "date" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= #{days} ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D."date", 'MM-DD') AS "LABEL", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAME_LOG G WHERE TRUNC(G.START_TIME) <= D."date") AS "VALUE" FROM DATES D ORDER BY D."date" ASC
